rationale: Since Badis chittagongis is known only from two localities there is little information available on its population and distribution and therefore is assessed as Data Deficient. The species range may extend into India, but further work is required to confirm this.
evaluator: Jha, B.R., Allen, D.J., Datta, N.C., Britz, R., Dey, S.C. & Vishwanath, W.
